titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to waive the foreign country residence requirement with respect to foreign medical graduates.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6747-6748)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 6/9/1994--Introduced. Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to permit a State agency under specified circumstances to request waiver of the foreign country residence requirement with respect to foreign medical graduates.
